name: Picture Rotator
short_description: This is a desktop application developed with the .NET Framework v.4.5. The main operation performed is the rotation of the pictures from a folder selected by the user and then the saving of the files in another folder inside the selected one, called "Rotated". The app uses two modes for this operation, a normal, sequential mode, and a parallel mode, which makes it optimized for multi-core processors. The amount of time necessary for the execution of each mode is displayed, and then a percentage can be obtained.
summary: An app for rotating pictures with 90 degrees.
